prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon that can charge through obstacles with ease.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountain habitats and has a tough exterior.
Show me a quadrupedal creature with a sturdy body and a fierce determination.
Generate a Pokemon that can withstand heavy impacts and is known for its resilience.
Design a Pokemon with a horn that can break through solid rock.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies strength and can be found in grasslands.
Make a Pokemon with a rugged appearance and a love for adventure.
